amendment.description: Amendment sought to reform the Federal sugar program.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 98 printed in Part B of House Report 113-117 to reform the Federal sugar program.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Pitts amendment (A052) Failed by recorded vote: 206 - 221 (Roll no. 281).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
